properties.title: How to setup the mobile device
properties.author: Franz Maier

section.p: For setting up the mobile device, process the following steps: Go to the provider of your mobile device and possibly install a firmware for it. The mobile device should be JSR82 conform, to support bluetooth communication. Dependent on the model, you have to invest more or less effort on that (see instructions of the provider of your mobile device).

section.name: 1. Deploy the SBB Midlet on the mobile device.
section.p: Copy the files SBBMidlet.jar and SBBMidlet.jad to your mobile device.

section.name: 2. Install the SBB Midlet on the mobile device.
section.p: Go to the folder where you copied the SBBMidlet.jar and SBBMidlet.jad file. Click on the jad-file and follow the installation process of your mobile device.

section.name: 3. Run the SBBMidlet
section.p: In the application window of your mobile device, click on the SBBMidlet shortcut and start the application.
